units.title: Establishment of clonal organoids from normal crypts
units.text: For clonal organoids from normal crypts, isolated single crypts were embedded in 10 µl Matrigel and cultured in HISM medium.
units.rationale: Describes how to generate clonal organoids from normal tissue.

units.title: Establishment of clonal tumour organoid cultures
units.text: For clonal tumour organoid cultures, tumour cell suspensions were cultured for 7–14 days in HISM without Wnt3A-CM. Then, 10–15 individual organoids were picked and separately dissociated into single cells by TryPLE (Thermo Fisher), washed and suspended in AdMEM containing propidium iodide (PI).
units.rationale: Provides the steps to derive clonal tumour organoids and prepare single‑cell suspensions.

units.title: DNA and RNA extraction
units.text: DNA and RNA were concomitantly extracted from patient frozen tissue samples or organoid cultures using AllPrep DNA/RNA minikit (Qiagen 80204).
units.rationale: Specifies the method for simultaneous extraction of nucleic acids.

units.title: Whole‑genome sequencing library preparation
units.text: We generated paired end sequencing reads (150 bp) using Illumina XTEN machines, resulting in ± 30× coverage per sample. Sequences were aligned to the human reference genome (NCBI build37) using BWA‑MEM.
units.rationale: Outlines the sequencing and alignment workflow for WGS.

units.title: Mutation discovery pipeline
units.text: All somatic changes in whole genome and targeted data were analysed with mutation calling pipelines developed in house (available at https://github.com/cancerit).
units.rationale: Identifies the computational pipeline used to call mutations.

units.title: Drug screening assay
units.text: Drug screening was carried out using nutlin-3a, afatinib, MEK1/2 inhibitor III, AKT inhibitor VIII, 5‑FU, doxorubicin, and SN‑38. Drug dilutions were performed in two series: 1) stepwise 2‑fold dilutions from 20 µM to 19.5 nM; and 2) stepwise 2‑fold dilutions from 15 µM to 29.3 nM.
units.rationale: Details the compounds and dilution scheme for assessing drug sensitivity.

units.title: Organoid CellTiter‑Glo viability assay
units.text: Tumour organoids were cultured for 5–10 days after being trypsinized into single cells in HISM without Wnt‑3a‑CM. Cell viability was measured by CellTiter‑Glo 3D kit (Promega) on a SpectraMax M5e (Molecular Devices).
units.rationale: Describes the viability measurement protocol for drug‑treated organoids.

units.title: Phylogenetic tree construction
units.text: The phylogeny of single‑cell‑derived organoids for each patient was constructed from substitutions called in WGS data. For each patient, a binary matrix of mutations present or absent in each sample was generated and used as input for the Phylip suite of tools.
units.rationale: Explains how phylogenetic relationships were inferred from mutation data.

units.title: Copy number analysis
units.text: Copy number profiles were constructed for WGS samples by ASCAT45,46, using adjacent healthy colorectal tissue as a matched normal.
units.rationale: Specifies the method for deriving copy‑number alterations.

units.title: Methylation profiling
units.text: Infinium HumanMethylation450 BeadChip arrays were used to characterize the methylation status of more than 450,000 CpG sites for all clones.
units.rationale: Provides the assay used to assess DNA methylation across clones.
